## NumeralPipe.transform() method

Formats number value as slovak format string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform(value: number, format: any): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | Number to format |
|  format | any | Format string (optional) |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
